   22: 
   23: -module(ssh_algorithms_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: -include("ssh_transport.hrl").
   27: -include("ssh_test_lib.hrl").
   28: 
   29: -export([
   30:          suite/0,
   31:          all/0,
   32:          groups/0,
   33:          init_per_suite/1,
   34:          end_per_suite/1,
   35:          init_per_group/2,
   36:          end_per_group/2,
   37:          init_per_testcase/2,
   38:          end_per_testcase/2
   39:         ]).
   40: 
   41: -export([
   42:          interpolate/1,
   43:          simple_connect/1,
   44:          simple_exec/1,
   45:          simple_exec_groups/0,
   46:          simple_exec_groups/1,
   47:          simple_exec_groups_no_match_too_large/1,
   48:          simple_exec_groups_no_match_too_small/1,
   49:          simple_sftp/1,
   50:          sshc_simple_exec_os_cmd/1,
   51:          sshd_simple_exec/1
   52:         ]).
   53: 
   54: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   55: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   56: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   57: 
   58: suite() ->
   59:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   60:      {timetrap,{seconds,120}}].
   61: 
   62: all() -> 
   63:     %% [{group,kex},{group,cipher}... etc
   64:     [{group,C} || C <- tags()].
   65: 
   66: 
   67: groups() ->
   68:     ErlAlgos = extract_algos(ssh_transport:supported_algorithms()),
   69:     SshcAlgos = extract_algos(ssh_test_lib:default_algorithms(sshc)),
   70:     SshdAlgos = extract_algos(ssh_test_lib:default_algorithms(sshd)),
   71:     
   72:     DoubleAlgos = 
   73: 	[{Tag, double(Tag,Algs)} || {Tag,Algs} <- ErlAlgos,
   74:                                     length(Algs) > 1,
   75:                                     lists:member(Tag, two_way_tags())],
   76:     TagGroupSet =
   77: 	[{Tag, [], group_members_for_tag(Tag,Algs,DoubleAlgos)}
   78: 	 || {Tag,Algs} <- ErlAlgos,
   79: 	    lists:member(Tag,tags())
   80: 	],
   81:  
   82:     TypeSSH = ssh_test_lib:ssh_type(),
   83: 
   84:     AlgoTcSet =
   85: 	[{Alg, [], specific_test_cases(Tag,Alg,SshcAlgos,SshdAlgos,TypeSSH)}
   86: 	 || {Tag,Algs} <- ErlAlgos ++ DoubleAlgos,
   87: 	    Alg <- Algs],
   88: 
   89:     ct:log(
   90:       "ErlAlgos = ~p~n"
   91:       "SshcAlgos = ~p~n"
   92:       "SshdAlgos = ~p~n"
   93:       "DoubleAlgos = ~p~n"
   94:       "TypeSSH = ~p~n"
   95:       "TagGroupSet = ~p~n"
   96:       "AlgoTcSet = ~p~n"
   97:           ,[
   98:             ErlAlgos,
   99:             SshcAlgos,
  100:             SshdAlgos,
  101:             DoubleAlgos,
  102:             TypeSSH,
  103:             TagGroupSet,
  104:             AlgoTcSet
  105:            ]),
  106: 
  107:     TagGroupSet ++ AlgoTcSet.
  108: 
  109: tags() -> [kex,cipher,mac,compression,public_key].
  110: two_way_tags() -> [cipher,mac,compression, public_key].
  111:     
  112: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  113: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  114:     ?CHECK_CRYPTO(
  115:        begin
  116: 	   ct:log("~n"
  117: 		  "Environment:~n============~n"
  118: 		  "os:getenv(\"HOME\") = ~p~n"
  119: 		  "init:get_argument(home) = ~p~n~n~n"
  120: 		  "OS ssh:~n=======~n~p~n~n~n"
  121: 		  "Erl ssh:~n========~n~p~n~n~n"
  122: 		  "crypto:info_lib():~n========~n~p~n~n~n"
  123: 		  "Installed ssh client:~n=====================~n~p~n~n~n"
  124: 		  "Installed ssh server:~n=====================~n~p~n~n~n"
  125: 		  "Misc values:~n============~n"
  126: 		  " -- Default dh group exchange parameters ({min,def,max}): ~p~n"
  127: 		  " -- dh_default_groups: ~p~n"
  128: 		  " -- Max num algorithms: ~p~n"
  129: 		 ,[os:getenv("HOME"),
  130: 		   init:get_argument(home),
  131: 		   ssh_test_lib:installed_ssh_version("TIMEOUT"),
  132: 		   ssh:default_algorithms(),
  133: 		   crypto:info_lib(),
  134: 		   ssh_test_lib:default_algorithms(sshc,
  135:                                                    %% Use a fake system_dir to enable the test
  136:                                                    %% daemon to start:
  137:                                                    [{system_dir,proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config)}]),
  138: 		   ssh_test_lib:default_algorithms(sshd),
  139: 		   {?DEFAULT_DH_GROUP_MIN,?DEFAULT_DH_GROUP_NBITS,?DEFAULT_DH_GROUP_MAX},
  140: 		   public_key:dh_gex_group_sizes(),
  141: 		   ?MAX_NUM_ALGORITHMS
  142: 		  ]),
  143: 	   ct:log("all() ->~n    ~p.~n~ngroups()->~n    ~p.~n",[all(),groups()]),
  144: 	   ssh:start(),
  145: 	   [{std_simple_sftp_size,25000} % Sftp transferred data size
  146: 	    | Config]
  147:        end
  148:       ).
  149: 
  150: 
  151: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  152:     ssh:stop().
  153: 
  154: 
  155: init_per_group(Group, Config) ->
  156:     case lists:member(Group, tags()) of
  157: 	true ->
  158: 	    %% A tag group
  159: 	    Tag = Group,
  160: 	    ct:comment("==== ~p ====",[Tag]),
  161: 	    Config;
  162: 	false ->
  163: 	    %% An algorithm group
  164: 	    Tag = proplists:get_value(name,
  165: 				      hd(proplists:get_value(tc_group_path, Config))),
  166: 	    Alg = Group,
  167:             Algs = split(Tag, Alg),
  168:             SupportedAlgs = proplists:get_value(Tag, ssh_transport:supported_algorithms()),
  169:             PA =
  170:                 case Algs of
  171:                     [_] ->
  172:                         [Alg];
  173:                     [A1,A2] when Tag == public_key ->
  174:                         [A1,A2];
  175:                     [A1,A2] ->
  176:                         [{client2server,[A1]},
  177:                          {server2client,[A2]}]
  178:                 end,
  179:             case lists:foldl(fun({K,As}, Acc) ->
  180:                                      ct:log("~p:~p  K=~p, As=~p, SupportedAlgs=~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,K,As,SupportedAlgs]),
  181:                                      SAs = proplists:get_value(K,SupportedAlgs),
  182:                                      lists:foldl(fun(A1, Acc1) -> 
  183:                                                          case lists:member(A1, SAs) of
  184:                                                              true -> Acc1;
  185:                                                              false -> [A1|Acc1]
  186:                                                          end
  187:                                                  end, Acc, As);
  188:                                 (A, Acc) when is_atom(hd(SupportedAlgs)) ->
  189:                                      ct:log("~p:~p  A=~p, SupportedAlgs=~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,A,SupportedAlgs]),
  190:                                      case lists:member(A, SupportedAlgs) of
  191:                                          true -> Acc;
  192:                                          false -> [A|Acc]
  193:                                      end;
  194:                                 (A, Acc) when is_tuple(hd(SupportedAlgs)) ->
  195:                                      ct:log("~p:~p  A=~p, SupportedAlgs=~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,A,SupportedAlgs]),
  196:                                      [{_,S1},{_,S2}] = SupportedAlgs,
  197: 
  198:                                      case lists:member(A, S1) andalso
  199:                                          lists:member(A, S2) of
  200:                                          true -> Acc;
  201:                                          false -> [A|Acc]
  202:                                      end
  203:                              end, [], PA) of
  204:                 [] ->
  205:                     init_per_group(Tag, Algs, Alg, PA, Config);
  206:                 L ->
  207:                     ct:log("~p:~p  Tag ~p, Alg ~p, Algs ~p, PA ~p,~nSupportedAlgs ~p", [?MODULE,?LINE, Tag, Alg, Algs, PA, SupportedAlgs]),
  208:                     {skip,io_lib:format("Unsupported ~p: ~p", [Tag,L])}
  209:             end
  210:     end.
  211: 
  212: 
  213: init_per_group(Tag, Algs, Alg, PA, Config) ->
  214:     OtherAlgs = [{T,L} || {T,L} <- ssh_transport:supported_algorithms(), T=/=Tag],
  215:     ct:log("init_per_group Tag ~p, Alg ~p, Algs ~p ,PA ~p,~nOtherAlgs ~p", [Tag, Alg, Algs, PA, OtherAlgs]),
  216:     PrefAlgs = {preferred_algorithms,[{Tag,PA}|OtherAlgs]},
  217:     case Tag of
  218:         public_key ->
  219:             %% Daemon started later in init_per_testcase
  220:             try
  221:                 setup_pubkey(PA,
  222:                              [{pref_algs,PrefAlgs},
  223:                               {tag_alg,{Tag,PA}}
  224:                               | Config])
  225:             catch
  226:                 _C:_E:_S ->
  227:                     ct:log("Exception ~p:~p~n~p",[_C,_E,_S]),
  228:                     {skip, io_lib:format("Unsupported: ~p",[Alg])}
  229:             end;
  230: 
  231:         _ ->
  232:             start_std_daemon([PrefAlgs],
  233:                              [{pref_algs,PrefAlgs},
  234:                               {tag_alg,{Tag,[Alg]}}
  235:                               | Config])
  236:     end.
  237: 
  238: end_per_group(_Alg, Config) ->
  239:     case proplists:get_value(srvr_pid,Config) of
  240: 	Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
  241: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  242: 	    ct:log("stopped ~p",[proplists:get_value(srvr_addr,Config)]);
  243: 	_ ->
  244: 	    ok
  245:     end.
  246: 
  247: 
  248: 
  249: init_per_testcase(TC, Config) ->
  250:     init_per_testcase(TC, proplists:get_value(tag_alg,Config), Config).
  251: 
  252: 
  253: init_per_testcase(TC, {public_key,Alg}, Config) ->
  254:     ct:log("init_per_testcase TC=~p, Alg=~p",[TC,Alg]),
  255:     ExtraOpts = case TC of
  256:                     simple_connect ->
  257:                         [{user_dir, proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config)}];
  258:                     _ ->
  259:                         []
  260:                 end,
  261:     Opts = pubkey_opts(Config) ++ ExtraOpts,
  262:     {UserAlg,SrvrAlg} =
  263:         case Alg of
  264:             [A1,A2] -> {A1,A2};
  265:             [A0] -> {A0,A0}
  266:         end,
  267:     case {ssh_file:user_key(UserAlg,Opts), ssh_file:host_key(SrvrAlg,Opts)} of
  268:         {{ok,_}, {ok,_}} ->
  269:             start_pubkey_daemon([proplists:get_value(pref_algs,Config)
  270:                                 | ExtraOpts],
  271:                                 [{extra_daemon,true}|Config]);
  272:         {{ok,_}, {error,Err}} ->
  273:             ct:log("SrvrAlg = ~p~nOpts = ~p",[SrvrAlg,Opts]),
  274:             {skip, io_lib:format("No host key: ~p",[Err])};
  275:         
  276:         {{error,Err}, {ok,_}} ->
  277:             ct:log("UserAlg = ~p~nOpts = ~p",[UserAlg,Opts]),
  278:             {skip, io_lib:format("No user key: ~p",[Err])};
  279:         
  280:         _ ->
  281:             ct:log("UserAlg = ~p SrvrAlg = ~p~nOpts = ~p",[UserAlg,SrvrAlg,Opts]),
  282:             {skip, "Neither host nor user key"}
  283:     end;
  284: 
  285: init_per_testcase(sshc_simple_exec_os_cmd, _, Config) ->
  286:      start_pubkey_daemon([proplists:get_value(pref_algs,Config)],
  287:                          [{extra_daemon,true}|Config]);
  288: 
  289: init_per_testcase(_, _, Config) ->
  290:     Config.
  291: 
  292: 
  293: end_per_testcase(_TC, Config) ->
  294:     case proplists:get_value(extra_daemon, Config, false) of
  295:         true ->
  296:             case proplists:get_value(srvr_pid,Config) of
  297:                 Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
  298:                     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  299:                     ct:log("stopped ~p",[proplists:get_value(srvr_addr,Config)]),
  300:                     Config;
  301:                 _ ->
  302:                     Config
  303:             end;
  304:         _ ->
  305:             Config
  306:     end.
  307: 
  308: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  309: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  310: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  311: %% A simple sftp transfer
  312: simple_sftp(Config) ->
  313:     {Host,Port} = proplists:get_value(srvr_addr, Config),
  314:     {preferred_algorithms,AlgEntries} = proplists:get_value(pref_algs, Config),
  315:     ssh_test_lib:std_simple_sftp(Host, Port, Config,
  316:                                  [{modify_algorithms,[{append,AlgEntries}]}]
  317:                                 ).
  318: 
  319: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  320: %% A simple exec call
  321: simple_exec(Config) ->
  322:     {Host,Port} = proplists:get_value(srvr_addr, Config),
  323:     {preferred_algorithms,AlgEntries} = proplists:get_value(pref_algs, Config),
  324:     ssh_test_lib:std_simple_exec(Host, Port, Config,
  325:                                  [{modify_algorithms,[{append,AlgEntries}]}]
  326:                                 ).
  327: 
  328: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  329: %% A simple exec call
  330: simple_connect(Config) ->
  331:     ct:log("PrivDir ~p:~n~p~n~nPrivDir/system: ~p",[proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  332:                                                     file:list_dir(proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config)),
  333:                                                     catch file:list_dir(
  334:                                                             filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  335:                                                                           system))]),
  336:     {Host,Port} = proplists:get_value(srvr_addr, Config),
  337:     {preferred_algorithms,AlgEntries} = proplists:get_value(pref_algs, Config),
  338:     Opts =
  339:         case proplists:get_value(tag_alg, Config) of
  340:             {public_key,Alg} -> [{pref_public_key_algs,Alg},
  341:                                  {preferred_algorithms,AlgEntries}];
  342:             _ -> [{modify_algorithms,[{append,AlgEntries}]}]
  343:         end,
  344:     ConnectionRef = ssh_test_lib:std_connect(Config, Host, Port, 
  345:                                              [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  346:                                               {user_interaction, false} |
  347:                                               Opts]),
  348:     ct:log("~p:~p connected! ~p",[?MODULE,?LINE,ConnectionRef]),
  349:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef).
  350: 
  351: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  352: %% Testing if no group matches
  353: simple_exec_groups_no_match_too_small(Config) ->
  354:     try_exec_simple_group({400,500,600}, Config).
  355: 
  356: simple_exec_groups_no_match_too_large(Config) ->
  357:     try_exec_simple_group({9200,9500,9700}, Config).
  358: 
  359: 
  360: try_exec_simple_group(Group, Config) ->
  361:     try simple_exec_group(Group, Config)
  362:     of
  363: 	_ -> ct:fail("Exec though no group available")
  364:     catch
  365:         error:{badmatch,{error,"Key exchange failed"}} -> ok
  366:     end.
  367: 
  368: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  369: %% Testing all default groups
  370: 
  371: simple_exec_groups() ->
  372:     [{timetrap,{seconds,240}}].
  373:     
  374: simple_exec_groups(Config) ->
  375:     Sizes = interpolate( public_key:dh_gex_group_sizes() ),
  376:     lists:foreach(
  377:       fun(Sz) ->
  378: 	      ct:log("Try size ~p",[Sz]),
  379: 	      ct:comment(Sz),
  380: 	      simple_exec_group(Sz, Config),
  381: 	      ct:log("Size ~p ok",[Sz])
  382:       end, Sizes),
  383:     ct:comment("~p",[lists:map(fun({_,I,_}) -> I;
  384: 				  (I) -> I
  385: 			       end,Sizes)]).
  386: 
  387: 
  388: interpolate([I1,I2|Is]) ->
  389:     OneThird = (I2-I1) div 3,
  390:     [I1,
  391:      {I1, I1 + OneThird, I2},
  392:      {I1, I1 + 2*OneThird, I2} | interpolate([I2|Is])];
  393: interpolate(Is) ->
  394:     Is.
  395: 
  396: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  397: %% Use the ssh client of the OS to connect
  398: 
  399: sshc_simple_exec_os_cmd(Config) ->
  400:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  401:     KnownHosts = filename:join(PrivDir, "known_hosts"),
  402:     {Host,Port} = ?config(srvr_addr, Config),
  403:     Parent = self(),
  404:     Client = spawn(
  405: 	       fun() ->
  406:                        Result = ssh_test_lib:open_sshc(Host, Port,
  407:                                                        [" -C"
  408:                                                         " -o UserKnownHostsFile=",KnownHosts,
  409:                                                         " -o CheckHostIP=no"
  410:                                                         " -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no"
  411:                                                         " -o UpdateHostKeys=no"
  412:                                                         " -q"
  413:                                                         " -x"
  414:                                                         ],
  415:                                                        " 1+1."),
  416: 		       Parent ! {result, self(), Result, "2"}
  417: 	       end),
  418:     receive
  419: 	{result, Client, RawResult, Expect} ->
  420: 	    Lines = string:tokens(RawResult, "\r\n"),
  421: 	    case lists:any(fun(Line) -> Line==Expect end,
  422: 			   Lines) of
  423: 		true ->
  424: 		    ok;
  425: 		false ->
  426: 		    ct:log("Bad result: ~p~nExpected: ~p~nMangled result: ~p", [RawResult,Expect,Lines]),
  427: 		    {fail, "Bad result (see log in testcase)"}
  428: 	    end
  429:     after ?TIMEOUT ->
  430: 	    ct:fail("Did not receive answer (timeout)")
  431:     end.
  432: 
  433: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  434: %% Connect to the ssh server of the OS
  435: sshd_simple_exec(Config) ->
  436:     ClientPubKeyOpts =
  437:         case proplists:get_value(tag_alg,Config) of
  438:             {public_key,Alg} -> [{pref_public_key_algs,Alg}];
  439:             _ -> []
  440:         end,
  441:     ConnectionRef = ssh_test_lib:connect(?SSH_DEFAULT_PORT,
  442:                                          [proplists:get_value(pref_algs,Config)
  443:                                           | ClientPubKeyOpts]),
  444:     {ok, ChannelId0} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  445:     success = ssh_connection:exec(ConnectionRef, ChannelId0,
  446: 				  "echo testing", infinity),
  447:     Data0 = {ssh_cm, ConnectionRef, {data, ChannelId0, 0, <<"testing\n">>}},
  448:     case ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_result(Data0) of
  449: 	expected ->
  450: 	    ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_end(ConnectionRef, ChannelId0);
  451: 	{unexpected_msg,{ssh_cm, ConnectionRef, {exit_status, ChannelId0, 0}}
  452: 	 = ExitStatus0} ->
  453: 	    ct:log("0: Collected data ~p", [ExitStatus0]),
  454: 	    ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_result(Data0,
  455: 					     ConnectionRef, ChannelId0);
  456: 	Other0 ->
  457: 	    ct:fail(Other0)
  458:     end,
  459:     
  460:     {ok, ChannelId1} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  461:     success = ssh_connection:exec(ConnectionRef, ChannelId1,
  462: 				  "echo testing1", infinity),
  463:     Data1 = {ssh_cm, ConnectionRef, {data, ChannelId1, 0, <<"testing1\n">>}},
  464:     case ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_result(Data1) of
  465: 	expected ->
  466: 	    ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_end(ConnectionRef, ChannelId1);
  467: 	{unexpected_msg,{ssh_cm, ConnectionRef, {exit_status, ChannelId1, 0}}
  468: 	 = ExitStatus1} ->
  469: 	    ct:log("0: Collected data ~p", [ExitStatus1]),
  470: 	    ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_result(Data1,
  471: 					     ConnectionRef, ChannelId1);
  472: 	Other1 ->
  473: 	    ct:fail(Other1)
  474:     end,
  475:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef).
  476: 
  477: 
  478: %%%================================================================
  479: %%%
  480: %%% Lib functions
  481: %%% 
  482: 
  483: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  484: %%%
  485: %%% For construction of the result of all/0 and groups/0
  486: %%% 
  487: group_members_for_tag(Tag, Algos, DoubleAlgos) ->
  488:     [{group,Alg} || Alg <- Algos++proplists:get_value(Tag,DoubleAlgos,[])].
  489: 
  490: double(Tag, Algs) -> [concat(Tag,A1,A2) || A1 <- Algs,
  491:                                            A2 <- Algs,
  492:                                            A1 =/= A2].
  493: 
  494: concat(Tag, A1, A2) -> 
  495:     list_to_atom(lists:concat(["D: ",Tag," ",A1," + ",A2])).
  496: 
  497: split(TagA, Alg) -> 
  498:     Tag = atom_to_list(TagA),
  499:     ssh_test_lib:to_atoms(
  500:       case string:tokens(atom_to_list(Alg), " ") of
  501:           ["D:",Tag,A1,"+",A2] ->[A1,A2];
  502:           Other -> Other
  503:       end).
  504: 
  505: specific_test_cases(Tag, Alg, SshcAlgos, SshdAlgos, TypeSSH) -> 
  506:     case Tag of
  507:         public_key -> [simple_connect];
  508:         _ -> [simple_connect, simple_exec, simple_sftp]
  509:     end 
  510:     ++ case supports(Tag, Alg, SshcAlgos) of
  511:            true when TypeSSH == openSSH ->
  512:                [sshc_simple_exec_os_cmd];
  513:            _ ->
  514:                []
  515:        end ++
  516:        case supports(Tag, Alg, SshdAlgos) of
  517:            true ->
  518:                [sshd_simple_exec];
  519:            _ ->
  520:                []
  521:        end ++
  522:        case {Tag,Alg} of
  523:            {kex,_} when Alg == 'diffie-hellman-group-exchange-sha1' ;
  524:                         Alg == 'diffie-hellman-group-exchange-sha256' ->
  525:                [simple_exec_groups,
  526:                 simple_exec_groups_no_match_too_large,
  527:                 simple_exec_groups_no_match_too_small
  528:                ];
  529:            _ ->
  530:                []
  531:        end.
  532: 
  533: supports(Tag, Alg, Algos) ->
  534:     lists:all(fun(A) ->
  535: 		      lists:member(A, proplists:get_value(Tag, Algos,[]))
  536: 	      end,
  537: 	      split(Tag, Alg)).
  538: 		      
  539: 
  540: extract_algos(Spec) ->
  541:     [{Tag,get_atoms(List)} || {Tag,List} <- Spec].
  542: 
  543: get_atoms(L) ->
  544:     lists:usort(
  545:       [ A || X <- L,
  546: 	     A <- case X of
  547: 		      {_,L1} when is_list(L1) -> L1;
  548: 		      Y when is_atom(Y) -> [Y]
  549: 		  end]).
  550: 
  551: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  552: %%%
  553: %%% Test case related
  554: %%%
  555: start_std_daemon(Opts, Config) ->
  556:     ct:log("starting std_daemon",[]),
  557:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:std_daemon(Config, Opts),
  558:     ct:log("started ~p:~p  ~p",[Host,Port,Opts]),
  559:     [{srvr_pid,Pid},{srvr_addr,{Host,Port}} | Config].
  560: 
  561: 
  562: start_pubkey_daemon(Opts0, Config) ->
  563:     ct:log("starting pubkey_daemon",[]),
  564:     Opts = pubkey_opts(Config) ++ Opts0,
  565:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}
  566:                                              | Opts]),
  567:     ct:log("started ~p:~p  ~p",[Host,Port,Opts]),
  568:     [{srvr_pid,Pid},{srvr_addr,{Host,Port}} | Config].
  569: 
  570: 
  571: pubkey_opts(Config) ->
  572:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config), "system"),
  573:     [{auth_methods,"publickey"},
  574:      {system_dir, SystemDir}].
  575: 
  576: 
  577: setup_pubkey([AlgClient, AlgServer], Config) ->
  578:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  579:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  580:     ssh_test_lib:del_dir_contents(UserDir),
  581:     ok = ssh_test_lib:setup_user_key(AlgClient, DataDir, UserDir),
  582:     _SysDir = ssh_test_lib:setup_host_key_create_dir(AlgServer, DataDir, UserDir),
  583: try    ct:log("~p:~p AlgClient=~p, AlgServer=~p~nPrivDir ~p:~n~p~n~nSYsDir=~p~nPrivDir/system: ~p",
  584:            [?MODULE,?LINE,
  585:             AlgClient, AlgServer,
  586:             proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  587:             file:list_dir(proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config)),
  588:             _SysDir,
  589:             catch file:list_dir(
  590:                     filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  591:                                   system))
  592:            ])
  593: catch _C:_E:_S ->
  594:         ct:log("~p:~p  ~p:~p~n~p",[?MODULE,?LINE,_C,_E,_S])
  595: end,
  596:     Config;
  597:     
  598: setup_pubkey([Alg], Config) ->
  599:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  600:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  601:     ct:log("Setup keys for ~p",[Alg]),
  602:     ssh_test_lib:setup_user_key(Alg, DataDir, PrivDir),
  603:     ssh_test_lib:setup_host_key_create_dir(Alg, DataDir, PrivDir),
  604:     Config.
  605: 
  606: 
  607: simple_exec_group(I, Config) when is_integer(I) ->
  608:     simple_exec_group({I,I,I}, Config);
  609: simple_exec_group({Min,I,Max}, Config) ->
  610:     {Host,Port} = proplists:get_value(srvr_addr, Config),
  611:     ssh_test_lib:std_simple_exec(Host, Port, Config,
  612: 				 [proplists:get_value(pref_algs,Config),
  613:                                   {dh_gex_limits,{Min,I,Max}}]).
  614:
